story.text: Steve Taylor has been an editor, technical writer, Perl developer -- all in shades. Programming and related work included dBase (1979, 1983); WP macros 1986; VB managing a database/1986; 1995 a bit more intense with Oracle and Perl; Emacs; Vi.. (Sure, there were spring chickens back then. With dark hair :-). But Wikis and the web could be forums of change and growth.., we hope.
Even Wiki history ... people like [[Ward Cunningham]], [[Clifford Adams]], [[Scott Walters]] - add the list of people behind open source, html, browsers.
About Wikis: varieties - [[Wiki Engines]], like this one - [[Sister Sites]] multiple variations - [[Wiki Clones]]; to start a wiki - [[Wiki Farms]] (to have your say?) - [[Wiki Forums]]

Pagelists: [[Recent Changes]], [[Quick Changes]]; [[[http://sunir.org/apps/meta.pl?list=WikiWiki sunir.org] Faster Text List by Sunir]], [[http://c2.com/cgi/wikiNames c2.com] slower text list], [[http://www.c2.com/cgi/wiki?search=.* www.c2.com] slower html list], [[Really Valuable Pages]];
Search for pages at [[Find Page]], [[Wiki Url]]

Administration: Signing in (see [[User Name]], [[Real Names Please]]), or choose the link here that resembles your address bar's text: [http://www.c2.com/cgi/wikiOptions www.c2.com] or [http://c2.com/cgi/wikiOptions c2.com]
January 15, 2005 mostly on [[Emacs Wiki]]. This is deletable if necessary. Thanks.

Steve Taylor has been an editor, technical writer, Perl developer -- all in shades. Programming and related work included dBase (1979, 1983); WP macros 1986; VB managing a database/1986; 1995 a bit more intense with Oracle and Perl; Emacs; Vi.. (Sure, there were spring chickens back then. With dark hair :-). But Wikis and the web could be forums of change and growth.., we hope.
Even Wiki history ... people like [[Ward Cunningham]], [[Clifford Adams]], [[Scott Walters]] - add the list of people behind open source, html, browsers.
About Wikis: varieties - [[Wiki Engines]], like this one - [[Sister Sites]] multiple variations - [[Wiki Clones]]; to start a wiki - [[Wiki Farms]] (to have your say?) - [[Wiki Forums]]
